ownershipInterestInformation.entity: Harry D. Callahan, M.D. - Owner/Medical Director

adverseLegalActions.description: TN State Medical License suspended; State Board Investigation underway regarding Charges or Public Disorderly from 12/31/2016
Criminal Conviction: Disorderly in Public (in hospital setting); Probation before judgement; $7500 fine.

TN State Medical License placed on 2-yr probation w/ Consent Order: Ordered to complete Board Refrain from personal conduct that negatively affects, or may degatively affect, patient care, or the ability to work with healthcare team members, undergo periodic compliance monitoring, and make an anonymous donation of $5000.00 to the Clarksville-Montgomery County Community Health Foundation

additionalInformation.resolution: TN State medical license reinstated to active status w/ no restrictions on 05/27/2019
